title: Bedcover, 1850–1900
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; Woven tape with weft fringe.
dimensions:
H x W (including fringe): 193 x 189 cm (6 ft. 4 in. x 6 ft. 2 7/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 35 x 23.5 cm (13 3/4 x 9 1/4 in.)
description: Unlined bed cover make up of three lengths of printed fabric with white fringe sewn to four sides. Pattern composed oftwo vertical elements: the wider a tear drop shape with bent top and flowers and the other two twined ribbons with a flower pattern. Background is light brown. Two groups of verticals are half dropped to fill width of fabric but the pattern is wider than this fabric. Unit of repeat: 35 cm. (13 3/4") high x 23.5 cm. (9 1/4") wide.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 1850–1900.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; Woven tape with weft fringe.. 1974-57-5.
